reviews.review: Very good times. Very good memories. And it still holds up very well today.

“It starts with one 
One thing I don't know why 
It doesn't even matter how hard you try 
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme 
To explain in due time

All I know 
Time is a valuable thing 
Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings 
Watch it count down to the end of the day 
The clock ticks life away

It's so unreal 
Didn't look out below 
Watch the time go right out the window 
Tryin' to hold on, did-didn't even know 
I wasted it all just to watch you go

I kept everything inside and even though I tried 
It all fell apart 
What it meant to me will eventually 
Be a memory of a time when-

I tried so hard and got so far 
But in the end, it doesn't even matter 
I had to fall to lose it all 
But in the end, it doesn't even matter

One thing, I don't know why 
It doesn't even matter how hard you try 
Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme 
To remind myself how I tried so hard

In spite of the way you were mockin' me 
Acting like I was part of your property 
Remembering all the times you fought with me 
I'm surprised it got so far

Things aren't the way they were before 
You wouldn't even recognize me anymore 
Not that you knew me back then 
But it all comes back to me in the end

You kept everything inside and even though I tried 
It all fell apart 
What it meant to me will eventually 
Be a memory of a time when-

I tried so hard and got so far 
But in the end, it doesn't even matter 
I had to fall to lose it all 
But in the end, it doesn't even matter

I've put my trust in you 
Pushed as far as I can go 
For all this 
There's only one thing you should know 
I've put my trust in you 
Pushed as far as I can go 
For all this 
There's only one thing you should know

I tried so hard and got so far 
But in the end, it doesn't even matter 
I had to fall to lose it all 
But in the end, it doesn't even matter” 
-Dr. Kliener and Eli Vance, November 1st, 2009
Released on November 16, 2004. Way ahead of it's time. It doesn't have the same charm as the original Half-Life, but still a very enjoyable sequel.
Honestly, what can I even say that hasn't already been said.
Duh. Its a classic. Stop reading reviews and go play Half Life!
ARGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH A HELP ME AGHHHHHHHHH HELP AGHHHHHH HHEKLP
現在回去玩還是覺得關卡設計的超屌==儘管畫質因為年代久遠糊了些
Must play game if you own a PC.
Игра топчик, тут и так понятно! Советую к прохождению!
aight, half the time im like ''THE FECK IS THAT?!'' the other half im stuck on a puzzle part for an hour until I figure it out being like ''that was easy, im just an idiot''. good game overall, 10/10
I'VE FINALLY GOT ALL OF THE ACHIEVEMENTS!!!!............ Oh yeah, this game is good btw
Dayı oyun bok gibi la oasdkpwkg4
Por fin lo juego desde mis 12 años y valió la espera, el mejor de todos half life!!!
gordon with crowbar be like: wack wack gud geam
El juego esalgo corto pero tiene buen lore y buena trama ademas de jugabilidad de graficos y gameplay excelente en mi opinion 8/10
tekneyle olan bölüm helikopterler falan geliyo ya orayı gecemedim ne iş hacı cıkıs yok ag
I need not say what is already obvious
I just....I don't really know what to say. I'm so mad at myself that I put off playing HL2 for 16 years. Still holds up--and then some.
Yes. It's the second best game of all time. Stop asking Valve.

>it blows up

Good game.
es muy buen juego para pasar el rato y rushearselo en unas horitas por si andas aburrido 10/10
Clasicazo de los videojuegos. Amado por todos, odiado por nadie. Por algo será.
Sequel to the first Half-Life with several visual and physics enhancements.
I wanna kiss gordon freeman so badly hes so hot
Claims of HL2 being the best PC game ever are not exaggerated.
Klasik half-life. Benim anlatmama gerek yok. Zaten ne kadar iyi olduğunu sizler biliyorsunuz. Bilgisayarı olan herkes oynamalı.
I think Half-Life 2 is the best game ever
I really liked the game, tho you can't have sex with the Headcrab unfortunately.

The game aged very poorly, don't recommend it, it isn't the masterpiece everyone makes it out for, it would be ok if there would be a multiplayer like in hl1 but you have to buy a separate game for that, so I don't recommend it
fuck this game, im going to church
why is the life halved and why is this the second time it happened

Half Life 2 is a great game people who have loved the first Half Life will like this game it has action and is kinda like a zombie survive game sort of it is a great game for all those stuff I think this a great game and better then Half Life at least I think it is any ways there is more to this game but  those are after the events of Half life 2 they are called Half Life 2 episode one and Half life 2 episode two any ways I recommend this to every one it is a great game there are some frustrating parts but don't give up keep going and enjoy the game

I freaking love this game man. Amazing story, Somewhat amazing game play, amazing characters, amazing level design, amazing art style. The only problem I have with it is the ending. Its kinda ubrupt but whatever. If thats really the worse part about this game then I think its fine really. PLEASE play this game f you have the option to. YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT AT ALL.

Muito bom, a história é "impecável", a jogabilidade muito boa, a música muito boa e condizente e o valor pede para você comprar. Por mais que custe 20 reais o valor compensa muito

Este juego contiene una increíble historia y también una increíble jugabilildad muy recomendado
good game. good stuff. bring back the Freeman!
soooooooooo boring. just play this if you want to go to sleep
Шедевральная часть серии, если не лучшая, наглядный пример того как нужно делать игры, а так же как можно сделать хороший сюжет без использования каких либо кац-сцен 10/10
